victoryCutscene.speaker: Narrator
victoryCutscene.text: The shadows dissipate, and Quetzi stirs...

victoryCutscene.speaker: Vicas
victoryCutscene.text: We did it? This is unprecedented...

victoryCutscene.speaker: Rooker
victoryCutscene.text: Exactly! Wait until the Red Mantle hears about this. Talk about uncharted territory...

victoryCutscene.speaker: Azrael
victoryCutscene.text: I wasn't nervous or anything. Unprecedented? C'mon, I do this kinda thing all the time!

victoryCutscene.speaker: Lyra
victoryCutscene.text: You know Azrael, the gap between confidence and faith is razor thin...

victoryCutscene.speaker: Quetzi
victoryCutscene.text: *cough cough*. Thank you heroes. I'm so lucky you came when you did.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Quetzi
victoryCutscene.text: There are dark omens on the horizon. The portents bring me awful visions...

victoryCutscene.speaker: Quetzi
victoryCutscene.text: *shiver*. I need warmth. Back to that kind baker I think.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Quetzi
victoryCutscene.text: When I recover, we'll see to how I can repay you. I, and the celestials that still linger here, owe you a great boon...
